<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>726d39bf-2360-4653-a85b-cf7148dc349e#1#3</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">Mongol lovasság</string>
            <string language="en">Mongol Cavalry</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mongolische Kavallerie</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cavalerie Mongolienne</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Cavalaria Mongol</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Cavalry Mongol</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μογγόλο ιππικό</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Caballería Mongol</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">Mongol lovasság bemutatása</string>
            <string language="en">Introduction of the Mongol cavalry</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">támadások,  ló,  lovasság,  tatárok,  Mongol Birodalom,  Arany Horda,  kánság,  Dzsingisz kán,  Batu kán,  Muhi,  muhi csata,  pusztítás,  </string>
            <string language="en">attacks, horse,  cavalry,  tatars,  Mongol Empire,  Golden Horde,  khanate,  Genghis Khan,  Batu Khan,  Muhi,  Battle of Muhi, destruction,  </string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Einleitung der mongolischen Kavallerie</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Introduction de la cavalerie mongolienne</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Introdução da cavalaria mongol</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Introduzione del cavalry mongol</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εισαγωγή του μογγόλου ιππικού</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Introducción de la caballería mongol</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Angriffe, Pferd, Kavallerie, tatars, mongolisches 
Reich, goldene Horde, khanate, Genghis Khan, Batu Khan, Muhi, Schlacht
von Muhi, Zerstörung,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">attaques, cheval, cavalerie, tatars, empire mongolien, 
horde d'or, khanate, Genghis Khan, Batu Khan, Muhi, 
bataille de Muhi, destruction,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">ataques, cavalo, cavalaria, tatars, império mongol, 
horde dourado, khanate, Genghis Khan, Batu Khan, Muhi, batalha de 
Muhi, destruição,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">attacchi, cavallo, cavalry, tatars, impero mongol, 
horde dorato, khanate, Genghis Khan, Batu Khan, Muhi, battaglia di 
Muhi, distruzione,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">επιθέσεις, άλογο, ιππικό, tatars, μογγόλος αυτοκρατορία,
χρυσή ορδή, khanate, Genghis Khan, Batu Khan, 
Muhi, μάχη Muhi, καταστροφή,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">ataques, caballo, caballería, tatars, imperio mongol, 
horde de oro, khanate, Genghis Khan, Batu Khan, Muhi, batalla de Muhi,
destrucción,</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <educational>
          <learningResourceType>

            <value>image</value>
          </learningResourceType>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <cost>

          </cost>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A tartalom kizárólag kizárólag az oktatás illetve tudományos kutatás céljára használható szigorúan non-profit jelleggel.</string>
            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
        <lifeCycle>

version:3.0
n:;
fn:

end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <classification>
          <purpose>
            <source>purposeValues</source>
            <value>discipline</value>
          </purpose>
          <taxonPath>
            <source>
              <string language="x-none">LRE-0001</string>
            </source>
            <taxon>
              <id>590</id>
            </taxon>
          </taxonPath>
        </classification>
        <metaMetadata>

    </metadata>
